verses.verse: Praise <WH1984> Yah! <WH3050> Praise <WH1984> the name <WH8034> of Yahweh! <WH3050> Praise <WH1984> him, <WH5650> you servants of Yahweh, <WH3068>
you who stand <WH5975> in the house <WH1004> of Yahweh, <WH3068> in the courts <WH2691> of our God <WH430>'s house. <WH1004>
Praise <WH1984> Yah, <WH3050> for Yahweh <WH3050> is good. <WH2896> Sing praises <WH2167> to his name, <WH8034> for that is pleasant. <WH5273>
For Yah <WH3050> has chosen <WH977> Jacob <WH3290> for himself; <WH3478> Israel for his own possession. <WH5459>
For I know <WH3045> that Yahweh <WH3068> is great, <WH1419> that our Lord <WH3068> is above all gods. <WH430>
Whatever Yahweh <WH3068> pleased, <WH2654> that he has done, <WH6213> in heaven <WH8064> and in earth, <WH776> in the seas <WH3220> and in all deeps; <WH8415>

who causes the clouds <WH5387> to rise <WH5927> from the ends <WH7097> of the earth; <WH776> who makes <WH6213> lightnings <WH1300> with the rain; <WH4306> who brings <WH3318> forth the wind <WH7307> out of his treasuries; <WH214>
Who struck <WH5221> the firstborn <WH1060> of Egypt, <WH4714> both of man <WH120> and animal; <WH929>
Who sent <WH7971> signs <WH226> and wonders <WH4159> into the midst <WH8432> of you, <WH4714> Egypt, on Pharaoh, <WH6547> and on all his servants; <WH5650>
who struck <WH5221> many <WH7227> nations, <WH1471> and killed <WH5221> mighty <WH7227> kings, <WH4428>
Sihon <WH5511> king <WH4428> of the Amorites, <WH567> Og <WH5747> king <WH4428> of Bashan, <WH1316> and all the kingdoms <WH4467> of Canaan, <WH3667>
and gave <WH5414> their land <WH776> for a heritage, <WH5159> a heritage <WH5159> to Israel, <WH3478> his people. <WH5971>
Your name, <WH8034> Yahweh, <WH3068> endures forever; <WH5769> your renown, <WH2143> Yahweh, <WH3068> throughout all <WH1755> generations. <WH1755>
For Yahweh <WH3068> will judge <WH1777> his people, <WH5971> and have compassion <WH5162> on his servants. <WH5650>
The idols <WH6091> of the nations <WH1471> are silver <WH3701> and gold, <WH2091> the work <WH4639> of men <WH120>'s hands. <WH3027>
They have mouths, <WH6310> but they can't <WH1696> speak. They have eyes, <WH5869> but they can't <WH7200> see.
They have ears, <WH241> but they can't <WH238> hear; neither is there <WH3426> any breath <WH7307> in their mouths. <WH6310>
Those who make <WH6213> them will be like them; <WH982> yes, everyone who trusts in them.
House <WH1004> of Israel, <WH3478> praise <WH1288> Yahweh! <WH3068> House <WH1004> of Aaron, <WH175> praise <WH1288> Yahweh! <WH3068>
House <WH1004> of Levi, <WH3878> praise <WH1288> Yahweh! <WH3068> You who fear <WH3373> Yahweh, <WH3068> praise <WH1288> Yahweh! <WH3068>
Blessed <WH1288> be Yahweh <WH3068> from Zion, <WH6726> Who dwells <WH7931> at Jerusalem. <WH3389> Praise <WH1984> Yah! <WH3050>
